CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL(PublishStatus,"Draft"), "Draft", IF( ISPICKVAL(PublishStatus,"Archived"), "Archived", IF( R_A__c <> "", "Proposal to remove", IF( P_V__c = "Rejected" , "Validation rejected", IF( P_V__c = "Pending" , "Pending validation", IF( R_C__c <> "", "Published Internally" , IF( OR( IsVisibleInPkb, IsVisibleInCsp, IsVisibleInPrm ), "Published Externally", "Pending Publication" )))))))
CustomField.label: Status
